channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love In The Limelight
channel.desc: Pen pals with Nick for years, Summer is reluctant for her relationship with him to go public when the former boy band singer comes to town for a comeback concert.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Magic of Lemon Drops
channel.desc: When Lolly's Aunt Gert gives her three magical lemon drops, she gets to experience what her life would have been like if she had lived her unfulfilled dreams.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Food For The Heart
channel.desc: Chef and owner of The Loving Spoonful, Lia, learns how to accept help - and love - when she tries to expand her food delivery business.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: For Love & Honey
channel.desc: After rescuing a hive, beekeeper Eva is thrown into a bumbling quest across Malta with Austen, an archaeologist. Buzzing romcom.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Heart Of The Manor
channel.desc: On the eve of her sister's wedding, real estate agent Lisa must decide if developer Matthew Wallace holds the key to her heart.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Romantic Friction
channel.desc: When Lea is tasked with designing the cover of a new hit romance novel, she meets the author - the seemingly snobbish Michael. Can she learn not to judge a book by its cover.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: An American In Austen
channel.desc: Having given up on searching for the man of her dreams, Harriet is transported into the world of Pride and Prejudice to find one. No man can compare to Mr Darcy - can they.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Game, Set, Love
channel.desc: Former tennis pro Taylor reluctantly agrees to coach her friend Will for a mixed doubles tournament, only to find there is a lot more to him than she thought.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Journey Ahead
channel.desc: Embark on an epic road trip as two strangers - a famous actress and a young wilderness expert - drive from LA to New York together, learning life-changing lessons along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Bridesmaid In Love
channel.desc: When the older brother of the bride catches perpetual bridesmaid Cate's eye, she must choose between fanning old flames and lighting new ones.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Falling Together
channel.desc: In her attempts to bring her feuding neighbours together, Natalie finds an unexpected ally in someone who wants to stay out of the battle altogether.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sweet As Pie
channel.desc: When Tamara visits her family's apple orchard, she reconnects with her childhood best friend and together they fight - armed with pastry and passion - to keep the orchard alive.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Been There All Along
channel.desc: Determined dating app owner Charley teams up with marketing expert Liam to save her struggling company. The answer to their problems may have been in front of them all along.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Girlfriendship
channel.desc: A booking mix-up turns Samara's birthday getaway into a week-long journey where she and her friends rediscover their passions, purpose and love lives.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Blind Date Book Club
channel.desc: As she enters a new chapter in her life, a bookstore owner finds love and purpose after agreeing to review a famous author's new novel.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Nashville Legacy
channel.desc: When Naima meets Damian after her interest in an undiscovered music group brings her to Nashville, their shared love of music blossoms into something more.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Made for Each Other
channel.desc: A sculptor uses magic to mould her ideal man into reality, but trouble ensues when she begins to fall for her human friend.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Styled With Love
channel.desc: Working together could put a budding personal stylist and an aspiring travel photographer on a path to their dream jobs, but will they lose their hearts along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Wedding Of A Lifetime
channel.desc: A recently separated couple must put their differences aside when they find themselves competing in a nationally televised contest to win an all-expenses-paid wedding.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love's Greek to Me
channel.desc: Surprises are in store for Ilana when she travels to Santorini with her Greek boyfriend Mike for a family wedding.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Junebug
channel.desc: 40-year-old book editor Juniper is magically reconnected with an eight-year-old version of herself who questions her life choices, including the dream of writing her own stories.
